DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Mobil to Take Large 4th-Quarter Charge : Mobil Corp . said it will take a non-cash charge of $ 250 million to earnings because of " the recent dramatic decline in worldwide crude_oil prices. " In a news release , the company said the charge covers excess of inventory book_value over current market_values , reflecting the decline in crude and product prices since 1982 , when Mobil adopted last in / first out accounting in its international marketing and refining operations .
